name: Rogue Dungeoneer
description:
*Controls-Meant to be difficult

WASD or Arrow Keys-Movement

Left Mouse-Shoot

Shift-(When enabled)- Dash

Enter-(When enabled)-Invisibility

Spacebar-(When enabled BladeCircle)

Right Click-Dart Storm

C key-Deploys Caltrops

Q key- opens chest when near

R-Restart-

Escape-End Game

This is one of my first projects, and is a work in progress. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game designed by Kidtruck91

Music assets by skynightmusic on youtube

Art assets by Sodacoma

Dungeon generator by Gentoogames
